name: Croagunk
flavorText: Its cheeks hold poison sacs. It tries to catch foes off guard to jab them with toxic fingers.

attacks.name: Ghastly Sound
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent can't play any Supporter cards from his or her hand during his or her next turn.

attacks.name: Finger Poke
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.
